properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Chokoloskee to Bonita Beach FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Marine Weather Statement issued February 1 at 11:53AM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
The areas affected include...
Coastal waters from Naples to Bonita Beach FL out 10 NM...

At 1152 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated a strong shower, capable of
producing winds to around 30 knots. This shower was located near
Naples, moving northeast at 40 knots.

Locations impacted include...
Naples, Vanderbilt Beach and Bonita Shores.
properties.instruction:
Mariners can expect gusty winds to around 30 knots, locally higher
waves, and lightning strikes. Boaters should seek safe harbor
immediately until this storm passes.

This shower will likely produce winds to around 30 knots, and could
pose a serious hazard for boaters. A special marine warning may
eventually be required for this storm. Boaters should consider
heading for shore before the storm arrives.

Waterspouts are possible with this activity. Remain on the alert in
case warnings are issued for waterspout development.
